venue.name: Plymouth Waterfront outside of Cupcake Charlie's

item.description:
WE NEED YOU!

Since our last photowalk, in Chinatown, everyone has been asking "When's the next one?" Here it is.

Saturday, June 18th at 10AM, we'll meet outside Cupcake Charlie's on the Plymouth waterfront (6 Town Wharf, Plymouth). There is paid and free parking in the area, a playground, many wonderful historical spots, and of course, the waterfront, for us to photograph. Like our foray into Chinatown, it will be what we make of it.

As was the case on our last photowalk, models will have to come dressed with hair and make-up the way they want to be photographed. Unlike Mike & Pat's Great Model Shoots, we won't have those resources available to us.

There is no charge for this photowalk. However, we will more than likely find someplace to sit and have a meal together like we did last time, so there is the cost of lunch. And of course, there is Cupcake Charlie's (which is open from 11AM-6PM) with their fine cupcake and frosting shot offerings!

I am also working on organizing another photowalk in July, more details to come!

If you have any questions, feel free to post them here, or send me a message. Also, please feel free to pass along this information to anyone you think might enjoy a fun day of photography & friendship.
item.name: Photowalk of the Plymouth Waterfront
